definition: the act of taking the ball or puck away from the team on the offense (as by the interception of a pass)
details:
noun
- the act of taking the ball or puck away from the team on the offense (as by the interception of a pass)
- a concession made by a labor union to a company that is trying to lower its expenditures
- prepared food that is intended to be eaten off of the premises
= example: prepared food that is intended to be eaten off of the premises
= synonyms: takeout, takeout food
